title: Verify Promotional Price at POS
description: A customer disputes the price of an item at checkout, saying it was on sale. The associate needs to verify the promotion.

tasks.description: Scan the item, which shows the full price.
tasks.expected_outcome: The POS displays the non-promotional price.

tasks.description: Use the 'Price Check' function to look up the item.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate accesses the item's detailed pricing information.

tasks.description: Confirm that a promotion is active for the item and override the price to the correct promotional price.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer is charged the correct sale price, and the associate can flag the signage or system issue for correction.
